items.prompt: Before merging with the other firm, our legal team must perform ________ to ensure there are no hidden debts.
items.explanation: Due diligence is the process of investigation and verification before a business transaction.

items.prompt: Transform this sentence using nominalization: 'We distributed the files quickly.' -> 'The ________ of the files was quick.'
A ________ agreement prevents employees from sharing trade secrets with competitors.
items.explanation: An NDA (Non-Disclosure Agreement) protects confidential information.

items.prompt: ________ refers to the process of taking legal action in court.
items.explanation: Litigation is the formal term for legal proceedings.

items.prompt: The company faces legal ________ because its products caused damage to several customers.
items.explanation: Liability refers to being legally responsible for something.

items.prompt: Nominalize the verb: The management [decision] (decided) to cancel the project was unexpected.
items.text: The management [decision] to cancel the project was unexpected.

items.prompt: Trademarks and copyrights are forms of ________ property.
items.explanation: Intellectual Property (IP) includes intangible creations of the human mind.

items.prompt: A ________ of contract occurs when one party fails to fulfill their obligations.
items.explanation: A breach is a failure to observe an agreement.

items.prompt: ________ compliance is mandatory for all companies handling European citizens' personal data.
items.explanation: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) governs personal data protection.

items.prompt: Transform: 'The team failed because they were lazy.' -> 'The ________ of the team led to their failure.'
Nominalize the verb: The [implementation] (implement) of the new software took three months.
items.text: The [implementation] of the new software took three months.

items.prompt: In legal contexts, ________ refers to security against a loss or financial burden.
items.explanation: Indemnity is a protection against loss.

items.prompt: Transform: 'We must comply with the rules.' -> '________ with the rules is essential.'
The HR department ensures that all employee records are ________ compliant.
items.explanation: HR must follow GDPR for personal data.

items.prompt: Nominalization is common in ________ writing because it sounds more objective.
items.explanation: Nominalization is a hallmark of formal, academic, and professional writing.
